lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bond market sources had speculated that RMJ is better prepared to offer its services nationwide than its three major competitors.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Government bond brokers are likely to give in to pressure from regulators and investors within the next 18 months, making their direct-dealing screens available to many of those firms that are not now eligible to receive them, said Richard Lacy, Chairman of Exco International Inc.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Earlier today, Exco said it purchased an 80 pct interest in RMJ Holdings Corp, one of the largest of the four bond brokers that dominate the business.

lst.name: sentence
